pages.title: Another Build
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zi-O (2018, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:zi_o/devices/another_build_driver)Another Build Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch$(li)Strength IV (with empty hand)$(li)Strength II (with weapon)$(li)Speed$(li)Jump Boost II
